meanings.sent1: The old car often malfunctions, causing it to stop suddenly.
meanings.sent2: My computer sometimes malfunctions and freezes in the middle of my work.
meanings.sent3: The robot waiter malfunctions and starts serving drinks to the wrong tables!
meanings.sent4: Her plan to impress the boss malfunctions like a broken clock, always at the wrong time.
meanings.sent5: The spaceship's engine malfunctions, sending it spiraling out of control.

meanings.definition: A failure to work properly or satisfactorily
meanings.sent1: Frequent malfunctions in the system have caused delays in production.
meanings.sent2: The technician quickly identified the source of the malfunctions in the equipment.
meanings.sent3: The comedy show was full of hilarious malfunctions that had the audience in stitches.
meanings.sent4: The relationship suffered a major malfunction, leading to a breakup.
meanings.sent5: The malfunctions in the clock tower led to chaos in the town's schedule.
